General.Name: Springsnow Food Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Springsnow Food Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, processing, and sale of white-feather chicken food in China and internationally. The company primarily offers fried and roasted, charcoal grilled, steam cooked, ready-to-eat chicken; and chicken nuggets, raw products, chinese cuisines, and coated products. In addition, it is involved in feed production and commissioned breeding business; production and sales of conditioning products; commercial chicken breeding and sales; food processing; and production and sale of organic fertilizers. The company also exports its products to Japan, the European Union, South Korea, the Middle East, and internationally. Springsnow Food Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Laiyang, China.
